title: Walt Disney Cartoon Classics, Volume 3: Scary Tales
overview: You're in for a ghoulishly good time with these funny and collectible scary tales, featuring Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and Pluto. Mickey discovers a houseful of haunts when he happens upon an old mansion. Then Donald is suddenly surrounded by sinister characters when he starts to read a mystery novel. And Pluto's greatest nightmare comes true when he chases one cat too many. This Cartoon Classic collection also features "The Skeleton Dance" - Walt Disney's first "Silly Symphony."
